values:
Attention all,

I now have a new journal:

Feel free to re-add me.

(I won't be deleting this one though. Too many posts of sentimental value... ;) )

Normal people usually make resolutions on New Year's eve. Therefore, I shall make mine on Halloween.

BY THE TIME I REACH UNIVERSAL DRINKING AGE I WILL BE FAMOUS.

It's morning, and I STILL have the welts from the corset boning..
but God was it ever worth it! 
And BTW, I had a great time. It was soooo nice to see everyone again. I should do this more often.

Seems like my belly button piercing is finally healed. 
And not a moment too soon- it's been five freakin' months!!!!
I think I'm turned off piercings for good now. As much as i'd love to get a chin stud or a lip ring, i just can't imagine that thing festering in the middle of my face for that long. YUCK!!!

Tattoo's, however, are a whole other story. I do plan to get another one for my b-day- I already have my "quota", as in I know what i want and where. I just have to decide in which order to get them.

...And after all of the day's adventures, they had sushi for dinner. 

*is a happy Lulu*

1. Go to Google.com

2. Type in the word 'failure'

3. Hit the 'I'm Felling Lucky' button.

...In TO, there HAVE to be some good used bookstores- I mean ENGLISH-ONLY, which in montreal is not humanly possible (DAMN YOU language laws!!!)?? 
And what about that colossal book megamall i've heard about??
I figure if I'm gonna do shopping, THIS of all places is where i want to do it. To hell with boots. I figure there are enough overpriced demonias to fulfill my heart's desire over here. 

As for a good selection of english books...well, let's just say my luggage risks to be very heavy on the way back.
And needless to say i will be very very broke. 

So just unleash me in a bookstore and watch the money melt.

I have to read up on my...horror. Yes, i said it, horror.
It's true that i'm a little, um, cynical about the genre as a whole and the cliche that it's become. But I'm very open to new twists on the old themes and original work that couls be classified as horror, in general.
So, Anne Rice aside, what are some good, ORIGINAL horror reads out there? (preferably ones sans vampires at all??)

x-posted in

Lately, I'm thinking i should travel, while i still have the time and the possibility...and by travel i don't mean going shopping to TO for two days. I mean all those places I've always wanted to see, like England, Germany... or sunnier places like Italy or Greece, or even the tourist-trappy Cuba/Dominican Republic (TAN?!?!?!?! AAAARGH!!!)
So, with that said, I'm going to actively procrastinate for the next ten years or so. 
We'll see.

That's right folks, I still don't have a basic CELL PHONE, let alone my own computer, but at least i have a CAPPUCCINO/ESPRESSO MACHINE. that' show you spell addiction... in fact, that's entering junkie territory there...
but hey, talk about an investment, it really does make kick-ass specialty coffees! now i can have the awesomest specialty coffee indulgences in town, without leaving the home...
The idea was almost as good as getting the AC, at last. 
*does a happy dance*

!!!I'm back online!! (however slowly)
I'm back in life
I cut my hair
I pierced my navel
I mailed some stories
I bought more LINGERIE!!! (woot!!)

I have some closure concerning my path in life...and it feels good!
...i missed the internet. *sigh* yes. addict.

I'm now not only a shoe whore but a lingerie whore as well. 

[and P.S., my computer's dead hence no posts/MSN for a while...]

Quiz.

Mememememememe......

LIBERATE THE FRIENDS PAGE!!!!

..and PS I cannot really relate to ANY of the Sin City characters.
:D

i got here by 8 in the morning for nothing.
:/

Off to TO in 27 hours!!!!!
WOOHOOO!!!!!

Question: should i be so infinitely self-indulgent as to give myself tomorrow off school to stay home in my pajamas (yes, i do have pajamas but no one will EVER see them, EVER)with a cup of hot herbal tea with honey, watching Dark Angel episodes i've already seen (that seemed so much more exciting 4 or so years ago when they first aired...:S)and trying to get over my cold? Or should i go freeze in a classroom first thing at 8 in the morning, enduring a nagging teacher with a propensity to confiscate the (progressive, literary) magazines i bring to keep myself from lapsing into exhausted (bored??) sleep, along with the fart jokes of the painfully stereotypical big fat "funny" guys at the tables to the left, right and in front of me??? 
 Decisions, decisions....
...And to think i used to hate V-day....

Let's hear the public opinion...
...What should i pierce?

Just got the movie Secretary on DVD. 
I can think of *someone* who will like it very much.
*wink*
*slap*

*coughs out a cloud of smoke*
Passeport was great...*cough-cough*
sorry lungs. :D

*stifled cough*

Winter break is good for the soul.
for once i'm actually feeling creative...

MERRY XXXmas EVERYONE!!!!!!

yeeeee!!

*floats under the ceiling to orgue music Karmina-style*

And a meme...
Your Boobies' Names Are: Thelma and Louise

Get your own Boobie Names

Spent a nice calm weekend with Richard... we ended up going to see House of Flying Daggers at last!! Great movie, despite some flashbacks from crouching tiger and co. but who says that's a bad thing? i love how the emphasis is on the chinese culture in these movies, rather than some americanized love story. Better good movies that are alike than bad ones. 
 However word of warning to all you movie gourmets out there: if you want to see any "good" movie don't go on a saturday night!! I do not mean to be prejudiced against yo's here... oh who am i kidding, i AM 100% prejudiced against yo's here!! but stereotypes exist for a reason. This particularly annoying group was sitting about two seats away from us and they kept talking THE WHOLE TIME. the one closest to me actually started yakking on his cell at one point... leaving me no choice than to gather my courage, poke him in the back and tell him to shut up. LULU POWER!!! although really, some people should be banned from seeing the good movies... let them watch the last vin diesel masterpiece instead. movie theaters should set an IQ limit as well as an age limit or something like that. All in favor raise your hands....

I never thought i'd say this of a Tom Cruise movie (or of a Penelope Cruz movie for that matter), but Vanilla Sky is DISTURBING!!!!
see it.

A big hug and thankyou to everyone who came out to wish me a happy birthday on Friday.

Especially for your love and support and not to mention the best party ever , and get well soon babe!!!!*hugs*

and for making every day a holiday and then providing a solid shoulder for me to pass out on in the end. :D

I love you all.

*kisses*

Today.
Book store. 
Pine trees.
Lights. 
Gift wrrappers with matching ribbon...
please...
God...
no.
Before heading out on Friday night:

Just like i expected:
Bush is winning...
Richard, i owe you a candy bar...:)
.. what? "don't speak too soon"? Hey, that's the most i can do to make Bush lose....

..You gotta LOVE life.

 - Brought application to new school, new program. I make so much as a step inside the school and bump face-to-face into the evil bitch who tormented me in high school. Oh well, at least i wasn't quite looking my worst. 

 - Apparently, some crucial document is missing from my application. I must get it or die. Getting it requires going to pick it up at my old high school. Hooray. 

 - Chapters doesn't carry books by Poppy Z. Brite. WTF?!?!?!?!?

 - Tomorrow that moron who rules the US is going to be re-elected.... :(

...I have a headache.

----------------------

On a brighter note... signed up for NaNoWriMo. *GASP* Am i actually going to FINISH that goddamn novel THIS time?!?!?!? i chose That One Idea that is a great concept but i just can't seem to sit down and type it up. We'll see where it goes. 

Oh and 14 more days.....:P

...Finally posting the pics i took at saph on Halloweekend...:)

enjoy!

HAPPY BIRTHDAY !!!!

keep the a$$- smacking alive for the years to come. :)

love ya lots!!!

;)

.....KMFDM in montreal at cabaret la tulipe on October 19!!!!!

...who's with me?

Tonight i think it's time to give my body&soul a very undeserved but necessary vacation. 
At around 7 p.m., I will be heading off to Club La Cite, the "rich-people's" gym/spa  with a eucalyptus-oil-scented sauna, a hot tub (a CLEAN hot tub!!!!!), 2 high-tech gyms (duh) and a kick-ass outdoor heated swimming pool on the roof, under the stars. =)
If you feel like joining me,  heaven is situated at 3575 av. Du Parc(downstairs past the movie theater and turn right) and the ticket to heaven costs $5 after 7 p.m. (you need to leave some important card like health insurance on the way in, so that they can be sure you don't make away with any of their enormous fluffy snow-white warm freshly washed and scented towels. =) ) 
Afterward Passport perhaps?
:D
...a bunch of drunken Goth kids can't be wrong??

HAPPY BIRTHDAY !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

....don't ever change,

....be true to yourself always

....and may happiness always be with you.

EDIT: I will also remind all of you that it is our duty tonight to get the birthday girl nice and drunk....the daiquiris are on me!!!! :D

i know i can make it happen for myself... AND IF I CAN, SO CAN YOU!!!! MWAH!!!

WARNING: although this specimen looks perfectly unoffensive and even kinda cute, when attacked it will fiercely defend itself with its unexpectedly sharp claws that can cause injury.

 

my battle wound...

...and the revenge (note blood):

...conclusion: DON'T F**K WITH LULU!!!....

DISCLAIMER: those are just random thoughts that are going through my mind. i am not implying any specific people. Any resemblance to actual couples living or dead....

___________________________

   Acutally, this should be about couples in general, not just GOTH couples.    To put it simply: there is too much emphasis on physical attraction. in a couple, physical attraction is not even the tip of the iceberg; it's a puny little snowflake sitting on top of the tip of the iceberg!!!!  So the two people meet, find each other very attractive, and click sexually. They're so glad that they fnally found someone who lives up to their high standards that they're happy to proclaim themselves a "couple". But, like said in replying to my previous post, there has to be "something more"; SUBSTANCE, or an emotional connection. As soon as the two mutually attracted lovebirds realize that there isn't "something more", physical attraction only doesn't keep them together for long; they stay lovers at most. Like the song goes: "I'm not in love, but i'm gonna fuck you till somebody better comes along". (who HASN'T quoted it in a frustrated heartbroken post at some point??) Let's say a person is looking for someone with a certain personality AND a certain look. That person might find both, but the chances that it's the same person are slim. (Beauty corrupts... but that's a whole other topic). What the person CAN do is find someone with the look (as looks are, unfortunately, more "in your face") and, as the halo effect goes, attribute to that person the qualities they are looking for. But as i said above, this illusion shatters in a matter of weeks.

    Don't get me wrong, i am not saying that appearance is meaningless. sociological studies show for a fact that it matters; there is the looking glass self, meaning that we act depending on the feedback we receive from others. And yes, i suppose you COULD form a deep conection with someone you picked up at the meat market, if you're willing (and you know HOW) to see past their looks.  I envy (in a good way) all those out there who can do it. As for me, I'm working on it...

That's about it. Feel free to share your opinions. Et je suis desolee s'il y en a qui se sentent vises... ;)

____________________

oh my, I'm going to get flamed for this... :D oh well...

Treat your friend as if he might become an enemy. - Publius Syrus   
 A friend may well be reckoned the masterpiece of Nature. - Ralph Waldo Emerson   
 But in deede, A friend is never knowne till a man have neede. - John Heywood   
 Few men have the natural strength to honour a friend's success without envy... - Aeschylus   
 He was once asked what a friend is, and his answer was, 'One soul abiding in two bodies.' - Diogenes Lartius   
 Defend me from my friends; I can defend myself from my enemies. - Marchal Villars   
 He deserves Paradise who makes his companions laugh. - the Koran   
 Laughter is the closest distance between two people. - Victor Borge   
 And do as adversaries do in law, - Strive mightily, but eat and drink as friends. - William Shakespeare   
 He used to say that it was better to have one friend of great value than many friends who were good for nothing. - Diogenes Lartius   
 Have no friends not equal to yourself. - Confucius   
 When the character of a man is not clear to you, look at his friends. - Japanese proverb   
 Without friends no one would choose to live, though he had all other goods. - Aristotle

************************
next: my theory why goth couples seem to break up faster than celebrities (WARNING: might contain a healthy amount of angst)

Hmmm, looks like i have a new Thursday night addiction. Beaoooooooooooutiful place, nice danceable music, hot ambiguous men all over the place, not to mention the DJ, but wait....where have you heard about the DJ before???....;) anyway.... i should thank a certain person for snapping me out of my lazy funk yesterday night. :)

  Besides, depite our most noble intentions not to stay late and not drink, well... *sigh* just gotta go with the circumstances i guess. And no, i'm NOT hungover... that Advil is purely PREVENTIVE, ok?

sometimes i feel like i'm the star of a particularly twisted version of The Truman Show. like everyone around me is playing this big game and they are prefectly aware of their every move in this game, and i'm just the clueless test subject... "if we do THIS, how will the subject react?" sometimes people say certain things and others say other things but the timing is too freakishly perfect to be a coincidence, like they intentionally kick me around like a soccer ball.
Help. I'm confused.
If all this really WAS a game, you'd tell me, right?*hopeful face*
